alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 4:53PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CROOK COUNTY... At 451 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Lightning Flat, or 42 miles northwest of Sundance, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 408 PM and 413 PM half dollar size hail was reported 14 miles north of New Haven. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lightning Flat and points east toward Baried Road along the Montana border. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
